name: Escape from Sharptooth Valley
storyline:
To escape out of an accidentally obstructed cave, Bastheet needs to recover her memory, as well as regain her longtime-friend Dinner's trust and his obsessed ex-girlfriend's empathy.

Together, you can easily get out of this stone-bite trouble. But you will have to deepen the secrets of this cave to discover the whereabouts of the long lost explorer Lynn, and with this, find out the cave's mystery and a new ally who will return all your memories ; altogether with Bastheet’s deepest, hidden and toughest secrets.

Can you defeat the powerful and ancient Dragon in order to pass and face the truth about your old life?
summary:
Escape from Sharptooth Valley is a single-player narrative game to walk, explore, fight, or befriend!

Choose your own story and discover the origins of the Gen-like life in the World of Nefthar.
